ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 568
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, the plat ruby veils regularly sell on E ci for 750pp, I have seen them as low as 600pp but very rarely. Kitasi ... From: Steven S. Klug
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, the plat ruby veils regularly sell on E'ci for 750pp, I have seen them
as low as 600pp but very rarely.

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: Steven S. Klug [mailto:sklug@...]
Sent: Monday, December 06, 1999 3:54 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Digest Number 568


From: "Steven S. Klug" <sklug@...>

Just a point. I got my Plat Ruby Veil for a little less than 500pp. I had
4 rubies on hand, which I
gave to him for it. Which amounts to around 480pp with good faction and
cha.

Laluni Songhammer of E'Ci

Ryan Honeyman wrote:

> From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>
>
> > PS - You Innoruuk Bards with the Platinum Ruby Veils and the Golden
Black
> > Pearl Chokers (you know who you are, Sylly and Harmonic) - who makes
> > them? How much should I expect to pay? Where do I go to find a Black
> > Pearl?
>
> Nadare, Smith, Circe.
>
> Veil runs around 1k pp.
> Choker runs around 300 pp.
>
> Black pearls seem to drop from aviak avocets most frequently.
> However I have got them from griffons and hill giants on the
> most rare occassion.
>
> Harmonic.
>

with the subject submissions.
